News.title: Health Ministry issues advisory amidst rising numbers of 'black fungus' infections - YourStory
News.author: Team SS
News.description: We answer some key questions around symptoms, how a diagnosis is done, and treatment for the infection that is appearing in some people who have recovered from COVID-19

News.title: Leading nutritionist shares a tea recipe to reduce excess mucous - Times of India
News.description: Practising some breathing exercises and sipping expert recommended herbal concoctions are the two most effective ways to keep your lungs healthy and cut down the risk of infection.

News.title: Explosives case: Mumbai cop Sachin Waze dismissed from service - Times of India
News.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
News.description: Suspended assistant police inspector (API) Sachin Waze was on Tuesday dismissed from police service, an official said.
